page.title: 14Hargate Hill.
page.content: I went to the bottom of the school playing field to view the countryside. These are some of the things I saw. I saw a hill called{Hargate Hill,}and in front of me up the hill by the main road was a ventilation shaft that sends air into the mine. I saw lots of fields. There were some bright yellow fields growing oil-seed rape, and there were lots of corn fields. I saw some dark patches where hedges had been removed so the fields were bigger. There were some trees in a straight line where the hedges had been. I saw a wood called{Miles Wood} and on the right there is a farm called{Mount Pleasant Farm}and near the bottom of the school field there are some allotments. {(May 20th.1985)}
